net.trajano.ms.authz

Class RevocationResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.ms.authz.RevocationResource

  • @Configuration
 @Component
 @Path(value="/revoke")
 @PermitAll
public class RevocationResource
extends Object
    Revocation endpoint resource.

    Archimedes Trajano

      • jwtMaximumLifetimeInSeconds

        @Value(value="${token.jwtMaximumLifetime:86400}")
private int jwtMaximumLifetimeInSeconds
        Maximum life of a JWT token. Past that period, it is expected to no longer be used.

                                                                                                                                          @FormParam(value="token_type_hint")
                                                                                                                                          String tokenTypeHint,
                                                                                                                                          @HeaderParam(value="Authorization")

        Performs client credential validation then invokes the revocation process from the token cache.
